panels.description: Shows the successful API call percentage of all APIs exposed by the agent.
panels.title: API Success

panels.description: The 95th percentile response time (considering all APIs). Represents the maximum latency experienced by 95% of requests, measured in seconds.
panels.title: Latency (p95)

panels.description: Requests per second. Shows the current throughput of all API calls being handled by agent.
panels.title: RPS

targets.expr: max by (spirl_trust_domain, spirl_trust_domain_deployment, spirl_app_version) (spirl_application_info{pod=~"$pods", spirl_component="agent", spirl_trust_domain!=""})

panels.description: Network bandwidth transmitted by each pod, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Network Bandwidth Transmitted

panels.description: Network bandwidth received by each pod, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Network Bandwidth Received

panels.description: Current CPU usage for each pod, measured in CPU cores.
panels.title: Pods CPU Usage

panels.description: Current memory usage for each pod, measured in bytes.
panels.title: Pods Memory Usage

panels.description: Displays the CPU limit configured for each pod, measured in CPU cores. This is the maximum CPU resources that can be allocated to the pod.
panels.title: Pods CPU Limit

panels.description: Shows the memory limit configured for each pod, measured in bytes. This is the maximum memory that can be allocated to the pod.
panels.title: Pods Memory Limit

panels.description: Percentage of CPU usage compared to the pod limit. Values approaching red indicate pods nearing their CPU resource limits.
panels.title: Pods CPU Usage Limit

panels.description: Percentage of memory usage compared to the pod limit. Values approaching red indicate pods nearing their memory resource limits.
panels.title: Pods Memory Usage Limit

panels.description: Out of Memory events count. Shows how many times pods have been terminated due to memory limits being exceeded.
panels.title: OOM Events

panels.description: The 99th percentile response time. Represents the maximum latency experienced by 99% of requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p99)

panels.description: The 90th percentile response time. Represents the maximum latency experienced by 90% of requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p90)

panels.description: The median (50th percentile) response time. Represents the typical latency experienced by requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p50)

panels.description: Shows the throughput of streaming operations, displaying both sent and received messages per second.
panels.title: Streaming Ops Throughput

panels.description: Shows the Requests Per Second (RPS) rate for each gRPC method, broken down by service.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: Shows the percentage of failed gRPC API calls for each method. Calculated as the ratio of non-OK and non-Canceled responses to total responses.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{
pod=~"$pods",
grpc_service=~"SpiffeWorkloadAPI|envoy.service.secret.v3.SecretDiscoveryService",
grpc_code!="OK",
grpc_code!="Canceled"}[$interval])) by (grpc_method) /
clamp_min(sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{
pod=~"$pods",
grpc_service=~"SpiffeWorkloadAPI|envoy.service.secret.v3.SecretDiscoveryService"}[$interval])) by(grpc_method), 0.001)

panels.title: Error Rate
